lines: *comment Money decreases due to lack of thoughtfulness (TH) and the phase's living expenses.
*comment Excluding living expenses, 0% TH loses half his money every year, 100% TH keeps all money
*comment The original game would apply the "remainingUnspentFraction" each turn
*comment ... here we apply that fraction annually instaed, by raising rUF to the
*comment timeUnit power.  That way, when we apply the new rUF after every turn,
*comment it will add up to applying the old rUF annually.  (Do the math...?)
There are seven stages of life in Alter Ego.
You play from birth until death, whenever that may be.
You may select icons in any order.
